meanings.definition: A plant-based milk alternative made from soybeans.
meanings.sent1: I poured some soymilk over my cereal this morning.
meanings.sent2: The store was out of cow's milk, so I bought soymilk instead.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to lap up the spilled soymilk, thinking it was regular milk.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as smooth as soymilk, a creamy and gentle touch.
meanings.sent5: The soymilk carton gleamed in the sunlight, promising a refreshing drink.

meanings.definition: The liquid extracted from soaked and ground soybeans, used as a dairy substitute.
meanings.sent1: My friend prefers soymilk in her coffee instead of cream.
meanings.sent2: I always keep a carton of soymilk in the fridge for baking.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled soymilk into the soup, creating a unique flavor.
meanings.sent4: The soymilk flowed smoothly into the glass, a creamy river of goodness.
meanings.sent5: The soymilk added a touch of sweetness to the recipe, balancing the flavors perfectly.
